comment.body: so how do i use this information to block these things?

> [pedoblocker](#comment_1_1JEmH2pfXkpMMdzsJ256jzq2GTSxEacS2B): Just do a file search for the said files (e.g. 45bc19354a07d4dfac7cd50e13848029.jpg). If some of them are present on your computer, just delete or replace them with any harmless picture.

I see, thank you. To-Do: Must make a script to automate and speed up the process.
